document_data.name: Green Altar
document_data.mainbody: The '''Green Altar''' was a shrine dedicated to [[Silvanus]] the Oak Father, in the city of [[Tilverton]] in [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Description: The Green Altar stood on a landing along the southern [[Tilver Stairs]] on the [[Street of the Sorceress]], that connected the city's lower city and the [[Tilverton/Old Town|Old Town]]. Climbing the long stair was the only way to access the landing, where a garden encircled the shrine consecrated by the [[Church of Silvanus]].
